Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information. Maintains and provides information on approximately 5,000 local CVF (Community, Voluntary and Faith) clubs, organisations and services in Sheffield covering everything from sport and leisure clubs to health and support groups. The information can be accessed on the Help Yourself website at www.sheffieldhelpyourself.org.uk. Also maintains Event Sheffield, the definitive website for events in Sheffield at www.eventsheffield.com.
